title: Must be level 12 or Higher to comment
body: My account is level 30 and I can't seem to be able to post comments and I don't know why. I've tried login out and back in but no results

replies.body: Sometimes is takes a post like this to force a sync on your Boards profile. It looks like you're good to go now! ^.^
I have this same problem. It says I'm level 1 but I've been level 30 for years.
